title: I can do better than your AI: expertise and explanations
task: Diner‚Äôs Dilemma, several diners eat out at a restaurant, repeatedly over an unspecified number of days, with the agreement to split the bill equally each time. Each diner has the choice to order the inexpensive dish (hotdog) or the expensive dish (lobster). Diners receive a better dining experience (here, quantified as dining points) when everyone chooses the inexpensive dish compared to when everyone chooses the expensive dish.two players decide to take an action (cooperate or defect) without communication beforehand, where defection leads to a higher outcome for an individual regardless of the other players actions, but with mutual cooperation leading to a higher outcome than mutual defection.
